history.proof: intros n m p H1 H2. hauto lq: on drew: off use: Z.le_ge, Z.mul_le_mono_neg_l, Z.ge_le, Z.le_neq, Z.mul_comm, Z.mul_0_r unfold: Z.ge, Z.lt.

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment n, m, p : Z H1 : n <= m H2 : 0 >= p Unable to unify "(?M1422 ?= ?M1421) = Gt" with "(p ?= p) = Lt".

original: intros n m p H1 H2. apply Zmult_ge_compat. - apply Z.ge_le in H1. apply Z.ge_le. - apply Z.ge_le in H1. apply Z.ge_le. - apply Zge_trans with (m := m); auto. - auto. - apply Zmult_ge_compat_r; auto.
